Translations.Text: I pereveli My synov Israila cherez more, i prishli oni k lyudyam, kotoryye chtut svoikh idolov. Oni skazali: "O Musa! Sdelay nam boga - takogo boga, kak u nikh". On skazal: "Poistine, vy - lyudi nevezhestvennyye
U etikh pogubleno budet to, chego oni derzhatsya, i pusto to, chto oni delali
On skazal: "Neuzheli ya budu iskat' dlya vas drugogo bozhestva, krome Allakha, kogda On prevoznes vas nad mirami
I vot, spasli My vas ot roda Firauna, kotoryye vozlagali na vas zloye nakazaniye, ubivali vashikh synov i ostavlyali v zhivykh vashikh zhenshchin. V etom - velikoye ispytaniye ot Gospoda vashego

I obeshchali My Muse tridtsat' nochey i zavershili ikh desyat'yu. I svershilsya srok Gospoda tvoyego v sorok nochey. I skazal Musa svoyemu bratu Kharunu: "Zastupi menya v moyem narode i ustroy poryadok i ne sleduy po puti rasprostranyayushchikh nechestiye

I kogda prishel Musa k naznachennomu Nami sroku i besedoval s nim Gospod', on skazal: "Gospodi! Day mne posmotret' na Tebya". On skazal: "Ty Menya ne uvidish', no posmotri na goru; yesli ona uderzhitsya na svoyem meste, to ty Menya uvidish'". A kogda otkrylsya yego Gospod' gore, On obratil yeye v prakh, i pal Musa porazhennym. Kogda zhe on opravilsya, to skazal: "Khvala Tebya! YA obratilsya k Tebe, i ya - pervyy uverovavshiy
